snippet.title: inSynch release trailer
snippet.description:
InSynch is Them Games' first published game and is coming out for Mac, PC and Linux on april the 24th!

If you're interested in the making of inSynch, you can find out more on our website http://www.themgames.net/

follow us on Twitter @themgames !

InSynch is a music game. Not a rhythm game, an instrument nor a music toy. InSynch intends to strike a balance between the player's reactions to the game's mechanics, and his intentional aesthetic expression through the medium of music composition.
Made entirely using frame by frame animation of handcrafted art work by french artists Le Creative Sweatshop and Sylvain Derosne of Manuel Cam Studio, inSynch lets you shape qnp's music in four environments, whether you are in pursuit of a high score or musical introspection through a free play mode.

If you enjoy beautiful things, please watch it in 1440p on a good sound system :)
